description: The Australia captain Pat Cummins hailed his side's Test victory against India as one of the country's 'great wins' after a dramatic final day at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The hosts took seven final-session wickets to win by 184 runs and take a 2-1 lead in the series between two of the sports' heavyweights. excerpt: Hosts take seven final-session wickets to secure 2-1 series lead over India at the MCG
text: The Australia captain Pat Cummins hailed his side's Test victory against India as one of the country's 'great wins' after a dramatic final day at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The hosts took seven final-session wickets to win by 184 runs and take a 2-1 lead in the series between two of the sports' heavyweights. Australia gamble pays off with late flurry of India wickets in classic Test Bigger than Bradman: bumper Test breaks Australia cricket crowd record
html:
The Australia captain Pat Cummins hailed his side's Test victory against India as one of the country's 'great wins' after a dramatic final day at the Melbourne Cricket Ground. The hosts took seven final-session wickets to win by 184 runs and take a 2-1 lead in the series between two of the sports' heavyweights.

  • Australia gamble pays off with late flurry of India wickets in classic Test

  • Bigger than Bradman: bumper Test breaks Australia cricket crowd record
